main event: A glowing red-orange object was observed moving up and down in the sky for approximately 20 minutes in October 1957.
interesting points: The object was bright red-orange and appeared to change size,The sighting occurred at dusk,The location was Carlinville, Missouri,Virtually the same azimuth and elevation were noted as the location of Venus in the sky at that time,The motion of the object was likely influenced by atmospheric effects.
